CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Windows enrollment attestation
CurrentVersion.description: Physical Windows devices will be attested at enrollment that enrollment credentials are stored in the hardware of the device. Administrators can view device attestations in the new Device attestation status report and manually force attestation from that report.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Windows enrollment attestation
OldVersion.description: Physical Windows devices will be attested at enrollment that enrollment credentials are stored in the hardware of the device. Administrators can view device attestations in the new Device attestation status report and manually force attestation from that report.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Managed device attestation for iOS/iPadOS and macOS device enrollment and ADE
CurrentVersion.description: Intune is bringing ACME and managed device attestation support for eligible Apple devices to GA. This includes device enrollment and ADE enrollments, including AC2. This applies to new enrollments with device enrollment (BYOD) and new enrollments with ADE or Apple Configurator tool.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Managed device attestation for iOS/iPadOS and macOS device enrollment and ADE
OldVersion.description: Intune is bringing ACME and managed device attestation support for eligible Apple devices to GA. This includes device enrollment and ADE enrollments, including AC2. This applies to new enrollments with device enrollment (BYOD) and new enrollments with ADE or Apple Configurator tool.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Auto-discarding Sleeping Tabs
CurrentVersion.description: Tabs that have been sleeping for a long time will be discarded to save memory. When a user navigates back to a discarded tab, the tab will need to be reloaded. This can be managed through the AutoDiscardSleepingTabsEnabled policy. This policy will be enabled if the SleepingTabsEnabled policy is enabled.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Auto-discarding Sleeping Tabs
OldVersion.description: Tabs that have been sleeping for a long time will be discarded to save memory. When a user navigates back to a discarded tab, the tab will need to be reloaded. This can be managed through the AutoDiscardSleepingTabsEnabled policy. This policy will be enabled if the SleepingTabsEnabled policy is enabled.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Deploy DMG and unmanaged PKG apps enhancement for macOS
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will be able to use "available" assignment type for DMG and unmanaged PKG app types for macOS. This enables end users to browse and install these apps in the Mac Company Portal.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Deploy DMG and unmanaged PKG apps enhancement for macOS
OldVersion.description: Admins will be able to use "available" assignment type for DMG and unmanaged PKG app types for macOS. This enables end users to browse and install these apps in the Mac Company Portal.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Entry point change - apps when reading emails moved to the ribbon
CurrentVersion.description: The Apps flyout and entry point for pinned apps will be moved to the Home tab in the Ribbon in the New Outlook and Outlook for Web. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Entry point change - apps when reading emails moved to the ribbon
OldVersion.description: The Apps flyout and entry point for pinned apps will be moved to the Home tab in the Ribbon in the New Outlook and Outlook for Web. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - Blanket custom retention policies which apply to all Audit recordTypes
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is enhancing the Audit custom retention policy experience. With this change, customers can now create blanket custom retention policies which will apply to all Audit recordTypes. This capability will become available in addition to the existing support of manually selecting specific recordTypes in the custom policy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - Blanket custom retention policies which apply to all Audit recordTypes
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is enhancing the Audit custom retention policy experience. With this change, customers can now create blanket custom retention policies which will apply to all Audit recordTypes. This capability will become available in addition to the existing support of manually selecting specific recordTypes in the custom policy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Excel: Extending support for Insights Services to GCC sovereign cloud
CurrentVersion.description: GCC sovereign cloud customers will be able to use features in Excel run by Insights Services, including Analyze Data found on the Home tab.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Excel: Extending support for Insights Services to GCC sovereign cloud
OldVersion.description: GCC sovereign cloud customers will be able to use features in Excel run by Insights Services, including Analyze Data found on the Home tab.

CurrentVersion.title: Word: Automatic summary of documents on file-open in Word
CurrentVersion.description: When you open a document, Copilot will generate a summary in the Word window. You can hide the summary or open the Copilot chat pane to ask specific questions about the document.

OldVersion.title: Word: Automatic summary of documents on file-open in Word
OldVersion.description: When you open a document, Copilot will generate a summary in the Word window. You can hide the summary or open the Copilot chat pane to ask specific questions about the document.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Improved authoring experience
CurrentVersion.description: This updates the Viva Amplify editors for both Outlook and Teams distribution channels to improve previewing and editing. These updates will provide improvements to load time and create a coherent audience selection experience across the channels.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Improved authoring experience
OldVersion.description: This updates the Viva Amplify editors for both Outlook and Teams distribution channels to improve previewing and editing. These updates will provide improvements to load time and create a coherent audience selection experience across the channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Remote Help for macOS (GCC)
CurrentVersion.description: GCC customers can now use Remote Help on macOS devices.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Remote Help for macOS (GCC)
OldVersion.description: GCC customers can now use Remote Help on macOS devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Revoke and Delete Cloud PKI Certification Authorities
CurrentVersion.description: You can now revoke and delete Cloud PKI certification authorities.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Revoke and Delete Cloud PKI Certification Authorities
OldVersion.description: You can now revoke and delete Cloud PKI certification authorities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Copilot summarization notification
CurrentVersion.description: The feature displays an Omnibox notification when users enter into a reading mode eligible page in Edge and offers them the option to open Copilot in the sidebar to generate a summary of the content.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Copilot summarization notification
OldVersion.description: The feature displays an Omnibox notification when users enter into a reading mode eligible page in Edge and offers them the option to open Copilot in the sidebar to generate a summary of the content.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Latest meeting experiences with performance improvements on web for Chrome (for anonymous join only)
CurrentVersion.description: The latest Teams meetings experience with performance improvements will be available for anonymous users who join Teams meetings on web in Chrome browser.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Latest meeting experiences with performance improvements on web for Chrome (for anonymous join only)
OldVersion.description: The latest Teams meetings experience with performance improvements will be available for anonymous users who join Teams meetings on web in Chrome browser.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Performance improvements for anonymous users who join meetings in Edge
CurrentVersion.description: The latest Teams meetings experience with performance improvements will be available for anonymous users who join Teams meetings on web in Edge browser.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Performance improvements for anonymous users who join meetings in Edge
OldVersion.description: The latest Teams meetings experience with performance improvements will be available for anonymous users who join Teams meetings on web in Edge browser.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Resource performance report for Windows physical PCs
CurrentVersion.description: The resource performance scores and insights for physical devices help IT admins make CPU/RAM asset management and purchase decisions that improve user experience while balancing hardware costs.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Resource performance report for Windows physical PCs
OldVersion.description: The resource performance scores and insights for physical devices help IT admins make CPU/RAM asset management and purchase decisions that improve user experience while balancing hardware costs.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: New data sync solution replaces old data sync solution for syncing forms responses to Excel
CurrentVersion.description: Forms is introducing a new data sync solution with higher reliability to sync forms responses data to Excel. The older version of live data sync will be replaced by the newer solution.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: New data sync solution replaces old data sync solution for syncing forms responses to Excel
OldVersion.description: Forms is introducing a new data sync solution with higher reliability to sync forms responses data to Excel. The older version of live data sync will be replaced by the newer solution.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Outlook win32 DLP Policy tip & oversharing popup support for new DLP Predicates
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing two new DLP Exchange predicates support for DLP Policy tips and Oversharing popups for E5 users: "Message contains" and "Attachment contains" with a focus on client-side evaluation on specific email components (like email body or attachments) only. Unlike the broader "Content contains" predicate that evaluated entire email envelope, these enable targeted DLP evaluation on specific email components only and show DLP Policy tips and oversharing popups accordingly in Outlook win32.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced content extraction and file type coverage for DLP on Windows devices
CurrentVersion.description: With this release, the file type coverage to scan, classify and protect sensitive content on windows endpoint devices with Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention policies will increase from current ~40 file types to 100+ file types. This release will make the coverage of file types on endpoint consistent with other locations such as Exchange, SharePoint and OneDrive. This will also include other enhancements like detecting label from pfile, detecting sensitive content in metadata, and detecting sensitive content in PDF forms.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: View attachments for Meetings in Teams Calendar
CurrentVersion.description: File attachments added to a meeting invite in Outlook desktop or web app are now visible for invitees in Teams calendar.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: View attachments for Meetings in Teams Calendar
OldVersion.description: File attachments added to a meeting invite in Outlook desktop or web app are now visible for invitees in Teams calendar.
